CustomObject.description: Configuration settings for Purchase Order consumption notifications. Controls which POs are monitored and notification behavior (one-time vs repeated reminders).

fields.description: Master on/off switch for notifications for this Purchase Order. Uncheck to temporarily disable notifications without removing the setting.
fields.inlineHelpText: Check to enable notifications for this PO. Uncheck to temporarily disable without deleting this record.
fields.label: Notifications Enabled

fields.description: 18-character Salesforce ID of the Order (Purchase Order) record to monitor for consumption notifications.
fields.inlineHelpText: Enter the 18-character Salesforce ID of the Purchase Order. You can find this in the URL when viewing the PO.
fields.label: PO ID

fields.description: Purchase Order number for easy reference (e.g., 00059438).
fields.inlineHelpText: Enter the PO Number for easy identification (e.g., 00059438).
fields.label: PO Number

fields.description: Hours between reminder notifications when Use Repeated Reminders is enabled. Default: 24 hours (daily). Only applies if Use Repeated Reminders is checked.
fields.inlineHelpText: Enter number of hours between reminders (e.g., 24 for daily). Only used if Use Repeated Reminders is checked.
fields.label: Reminder Frequency (Hours)

fields.description: Toggle between one-time notifications (unchecked) and repeated reminders (checked). When unchecked, sends one notification per threshold. When checked, sends reminder emails based on Reminder Frequency Hours.
fields.inlineHelpText: Unchecked = One notification per threshold. Checked = Repeated reminders at frequency specified below.
fields.label: Use Repeated Reminders

CustomObject.label: PO Notification Settings
